original_text: And they shall deal with thee hatefully, and shall take away all thy labour, and shall leave thee naked and bare: and the nakedness of thy whoredoms shall be discovered, both thy lewdness and thy whoredoms.
korean_text: 그들이 미워하는 마음으로 네게 행하여 네 모든 수고한 것을 빼앗고 너를 벌거벗은 몸으로 두어서 네 음행의 벗은 몸 곧 네 음란하며 행음하던 것을 드러낼 것이라

sentences.original_text: And they shall deal with thee hatefully,
and shall take away all thy labour,
sentences.korean_translation: 너의 모든 수고를 빼앗아 갈 것이며,

sentences.original_text: and shall leave thee naked and bare:
and the nakedness of thy whoredoms shall be discovered,
both thy lewdness and thy whoredoms.
sentences.korean_translation: 네 음란함과 네 음행이 모두 드러나리라.
